synopsis.text: And so begins the extraordinary journey of Tamaki Kasuga, an ordinary girl thrust into an extraordinary world of mythical creatures, ancient prophecies, and supernatural guardians. When her parents are suddenly transferred overseas, Tamaki finds herself returning to her roots in a serene countryside village to live with her grandmother. But the tranquility of her new life is shattered when she is attacked by mythical beings, only to be saved by a mysterious young man who is part demon and part high school student. As it turns out, Tamaki is the latest in a line of Tamayori princesses, destined to seal away the powerful and dangerous Onikirimaru sword with the help of her guardians, the Shugogo family. But as the seal weakens and the local gods grow restless, Tamaki must navigate the trials and tribulations of high school while also embracing her destiny and protecting her loved ones from the forces of darkness. Will she be able to rise to the challenge and fulfill her duty as a Tamayori princess? Join Tamaki and her guardians in Hiiro no Kakera ~ The Tamayori Princess Saga and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
